content: --चर, --चार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} moving freely or unrestrained, wandering at will; <ls>Ku. 1. 50.</ls>

--चार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} unchecked, unrestrained. (--रः {1} unrestrained motion. {2} independent or wilful action, wantonness; न कामचारो मयि शंकनीयः <ls>R. 14. 62.</ls> {3} one's will or pleasure, free will; कामचारानुज्ञा <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 220.</ls> {4} sensuality. {5} selfishness.
